title: Enjoy our beautiful landscaped community! 2 bed, 2 bath! 1186 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Welcome to East Perimeter Pointe Apartments!', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr. Decatur, GA 30035', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 2 BA - 1186 - 1307 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1500 |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these singular Decatur, GA Apartments your new home.", 'Our community features:', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● Business Center', '● Common Area Wi-Fi', '● Fax/Copy Services', '● Green Community', '● Indoor Pool', '● On-Site Maintenance', '● Outdoor Area', '● Public Transportation', '● Valet Trash', '● Electronic Rent Payment', '● Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '● Monthly Resident Events', '● On-site Maintenance Management', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Public Transportation', '● Racquetball Court(s)', '● Resident Referral Bonuses', '● Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Our unit features:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable Ready', '● Custom Paint Tone', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Garbage Disposal', '● Linen Closet', '● Storage Units', '● Sunrooms', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call
